title: Mine
description: On stage, Fin is Thor. Angry and invincible. Yet for all his potential, people always leave him. Kayla is the only girl he's ever met whoâ€™s worth loving. The only one he's ever wanted to be worth something for.Kayla knows she's weird and unlovable. But she wants to believe there is no reason to be sad anymore.In each other Fin and Kayla find the only place they've ever belonged. Until the ghosts from the past come to break them apart.
author: Sally Partridge
